H0.text: What is the pole called which is used for propelling a barge or punt. Oar

H1.text: What is the pole called which is used for propelling a barge or punt. Paddle

H2.text: What is the pole called which is used for propelling a barge or punt. Boom

H3.text: What is the pole called which is used for propelling a barge or punt. Quant

A4.text: Oars are connected to the vessel by a pivot point (oarlock or thole).

A5.text: Paddles are held in both hands by the paddler, and are not attached to the vessel.
